513 LAURA INGRAHAM: "The requirement that companies post jobs or pay fines doesn't solve the problem.  With Americans being laid off by Big Tech, there should be zero H1-B visas." posted 3 days ago by bleeje 19 comments award share report block Laura Ingraham @IngrahamAngle • 3d The requirement that companies post jobs or pay fines doesn't solve the problem.  With Americans being laid off by Big Tech, there should be zero H1-B visas. johnny maga @_johnnymaga • 3d Woah. Trump’s Secretary of Labor just announced that they have over 175 investigations into companies suspected of abusing the H-1B visa program. She says they’re going to force employers to post job openings to the American public before hiring H-1Bs.
